name: HUNDE HOPPEN
description:
HUNDE HOPPEN THE HUNDE GOES FOR A HOP

DONT FALL OFF

Arrows to move, Space to jump.

J  A  P  A  N              2   0   7   7 

THE RICH ARE ABANDONING THEIR FLESH DOGS FOR ADVANCED CYBER DOGS.

YOU ARE ROBOT DOGGO, HUNTED BY THE CARBON BASED PETS.

THE LAST CYBER SURVIVOR OF A TECH PHOBIC REVOLUTION.

NOW 

YOU 

RUN

AND 

HOP
